title: I have download issues
body: When I started to update the game it downloaded like 600 MB and then started going down.I tried redownloading,but it didnÂ´t work!Can someone help,please?

replies.body: I got it,I just let it download for an hour.

Are you actually running into an error or are you just seeing your download speed decrease? Don't worry too much about the "speeds" listed, as the first 33% can take some time since it's not entirely just downloading files, the patcher is actually scanning your directory for missing or corrupted files before attempting to pull them from the servers. If you aren't seeing an error, I recommend just letting the patching process run for a while without being interrupted.

If you have any questions, let me know.
